summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of POS ticket management functions. All 6 features tested and working correctly: Dividir Ticket, Combinar Ticket, Despejar Ticket, Guardar Ticket, GUARDAR/TICKETS button logic, and mobile article counter.

issues: Duplicate 'Sincronizar' option appears when both mobile and desktop menus are visible simultaneously (edge case on certain viewport sizes). This is expected behavior for responsive design - one menu for mobile header, one for desktop ticket panel.
